channel.title: Machine Learning on oneAPI Community Page
channel.description: Recent content in Machine Learning on oneAPI Community Page

item.title: Loan Acceptance Using ML
item.description: Machine Learning project for Loan Acceptance prediction with OneAPI optimization

item.title: OneAPI Early Warning System Waste Water Analysis
item.description: The AI-Powered Early Warning System leverages cutting-edge technologies, including Intel oneAPI, to analyze wastewater data and detect early signs of infectious diseases, antibiotic resistance, and emerging health threats. This revolutionary system provides a proactive approach to safeguarding public health by predicting outbreaks before they escalate.

item.title: Insruance Fraud Detection
item.description: Insurance Fraud Detection Classififcation ML model using OneAPI (Decision Tree)

item.title: Water Quality Analysis and Prediction
item.description: A water quality analysis and prediction system using Intel’s oneAPI Data Analytics Library and traditional Python libraries. The project involves exploring a large-scale water quality dataset, conducting thorough data cleaning, and implementing a machine learning model for predicting water quality.

item.title: RUL Prediction From NASA S Dataset for Aircraft Engines Using Intel oneAPI
item.description: Machinery like Biomedical Recording Instruments often are subject to wear-and-tear and hence this study on Remaining Useful Life (RUL) with NASA dataset on machines under the influence of even external factors influenced while in space can be an eye-opener to enhance the diagnosis accuracy by assisting maintenance using AI to ensure high precision of the biomedical instruments, especially in applications like telemedicine.

item.title: Insurance Fraud Detection OneAPI
item.description: Insurance Fraud Detection Classififcation ML model using OneAPI (Decision Tree)
